# Introduction

RGMQLScalaLibs is a data package containing compiled libraries in jar format
used by RGMQL package to
 
# Contents of the package
GMQL scala API

They are available in jar format within the extdata directory of this package and 
can be located through r 
```
system.file('extdata', 'java', package='RGMQLScalaLib')
```
